name: Ascii Fly
description:
Have fun playing this awesome endless racer completely made out of text but still in 3d. 

Everything in this game is made out of different fonts of text. For example, the obstacles are made out of the Times New Roman Font but the rest of the screen i made out of Lucida and Courier fonts. The screenshot below shows what the game looks like. (You can see the text characters more prominently in the actual game beacuse the screen shot is small).

Any and all feedback and suggestions welcome.
